answerText: Dungeons & Dragons [or D&D][10] This metal singer was sued in 1986 for allegedly causing the suicide of a teenager with a Randy Rhoads-penned song on one of his solo albums; he explained that "Suicide Solution" was actually a term he used to speak negatively about alcoholic beverages.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 13 | 12 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: James Dallas Egbert was a player of this game who supposedly got lost in his school's steam tunnels while playing a live action version. For 10 points each: [10] Name this role-playing game created by Gary Gygax, which was attacked as inducing suicides and Satan worship by people such as Patricia Pulling and psychiatrist Thomas Radecki.
